analyzed: ānanda jāte ti dasa gaṇe patīte
sakkañcaḥ indam suci vasane ca deve
kim deva saṅghaḥ atiḥ iva kalya rūpaḥ
dhunātha me sa sayam khippa mārisā
manussa loke hita sukha tthāya jātaḥ
tenamha tuṭṭhāḥ atiḥ iva kalya rūpā
kuhim kumāraḥ aham api daṭṭhu kāmaḥ
ukkā mukha iva su kusala sampahaṭṭha
na ca api imassa bhavissati antarāyaḥ
vatteḥ satā ayam bahu jana hita anukampī
na sossam a sama dhurassa dhamma
